responsibilities: Perform quarterly loss reserving analyses for property and casualty lines using Chain-Ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methodologies.
Maintain and update complex pricing models in Excel and VBA to support annual rate filings and profitability studies.
Collaborate with the data engineering team to streamline the extraction of policyholder data using SQL, reducing report generation time by 20%.
Assist in the preparation of actuarial memorandums and state regulatory filings to ensure compliance with statutory requirements.
Analyzed large datasets to identify emerging loss trends in personal auto insurance lines using R and SAS.
Conducted impact studies for proposed rating factor changes and presented findings to the product management team.
Automated routine data validation checks using Python, enhancing the accuracy of data used in predictive modeling.
